about_the_game:
The game is in early development - if you want to play it, you can click on the wishlist

  • 《China Chic Girl》is a first-person romance puzzle game that blends cute and light horror elements. Players will enter a fantastical and eerie world filled with Chinese chic culture, embarking on a unique adventure through puzzle-solving and romantic interactions.

    Key Features:

    • First-Person Perspective Experience: Immerse yourself in the game world through the first-person perspective, engaging in intimate interactions with the "China Chic Girl" and experiencing both fun dialogues and spine-chilling moments.

    • Romance and Puzzle-Solving Combined: Not only will you solve puzzles in the game, but you will also develop romantic relationships with distinct characters, uncovering their individual stories and secrets.

    • Rich Interactivity: Your choices will influence the storyline, leading to multiple endings. Create your own adventure and love story based on the decisions you make.

    • Unique Art Style: Featuring a blend of cute and light horror elements, the game creates a world that is both magical and slightly mysterious, embodying the charm of Chinese chic culture.

    • Varied Tasks and Challenges: Unlock new tasks, collect clues, solve puzzles, and progress through the romantic storyline as you advance in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 / AMD Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 4GB / AMD RX 550 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 / AMD Ryzen 5 5500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 8GB / AMD RX 6600 XT 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: After working overtime in the early morning, I spent half an hour ordering takeout. When I received it, I saw... Peking Opera, a girl, sunglasses, a camera, and a big 《潮》 printed on the chest......How would you make a decision?
